name: dataset-processing
description: PySpark dataset processing for educational analytics

scripts.test: source env/bin/activate && python -m unittest tests.test_utils tests.test_event_registry tests.test_lookup tests.test_manifest tests.test_keys -v
scripts.test:all: source env/bin/activate && python -m unittest discover tests -v
scripts.test:core: source env/bin/activate && python -m unittest tests.test_utils tests.test_event_registry tests.test_lookup tests.test_manifest tests.test_keys -v
scripts.setup: python -m venv env && source env/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt

author: Your Team
